writeBedGraph

public void writeBedGraph(String fileName, String bedOptions)
***************************** Writes a bed graph file corresponding to this bed file. Bed graph options include: track type=bedGraph name=track_label description=center_label visibility=display_mode color=r,g,b altColor=r,g,b priority=priority autoScale=on|off gridDefault=on|off maxHeightPixels=max:default:min graphType=bar|points viewLimits=lower:upper yLineMark=real-value yLineOnOff=on|off windowingFunction=maximum|mean|minimum smoothingWindow=off|2-16
